thread.title: Up Tech Services Announces Launch of Redesigned Website
thread.title_full: Up Tech Services Announces Launch of Redesigned Website - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Up Tech Services Announces Launch of Redesigned Website
text:
New site uptechservices.com delivers enhanced content and responsive design to provide managed IT services information for businesses in Greater Nashville area.
NASHVILLE, Tenn.
Up Tech Services, a provider of managed IT services, cloud solutions and telecommunications services for businesses throughout the Greater Nashville area, has announced the launch of a new and much anticipated website redesign at http://www.uptechservices.com .
The redesign includes enhancements which provide improved navigation and better organization of content that also incorporates SEO. Up Tech intends for the new design to better meet the needs of clients and visitors by making the site more functional, intuitive and appealing.
Enhancements to the website include:
Clean, fresh look with easy-to-navigate layout Streamlined cloud solution and IT service offerings New features, including Industries Served and Careers Up Tech Services Client Portal
“I’m very proud to unveil Up Tech’s new website design,” said Andrew “Pete” Peterson, CTO, Up Tech Services. “Our goal was to create a site that allows for a very positive user experience and adds value by providing useful information for clients and visitors. We are confident the new website redesign will help achieve this objective.”
To learn more about Up Tech Services, the managed IT and cloud services the MSP provides, and the industries it serves, please visit http://www.uptechservices.com .
About Up Tech Services
Up Tech Services is a managed IT service provider (MSP) with locations stretching along Interstate 24 from Chattanooga, Tennessee to Nashville. The MSP offers premium IT support, cloud solutions, telecommunications services and IT consulting to small and medium businesses in several industries, including education, healthcare and finance. Some of the managed and customized IT services include systems security, data and backup recovery, VoIP phone solutions, wireless solutions, regulatory compliance for HIPAA, FFIEC and FDIC, network and server management, IT consulting, IT strategy planning, Virtual CIO, and more. For more information about Up Tech Services and its IT support solutions, visit the company on the web at http://www.uptechservices.com . To learn more now, call 877.752.8444. To get the latest industry news and trends, go to http://www.uptechservices.com/blog/ .
